daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A nor'easter has caused significant disruptions in NYC, including road closures in Hoboken and a tragic incident involving an elderly woman killed by a flying solar panel, while the mayoral race heats up with candidates like Mamdani and Cuomo vying for support amid rising food costs and tenant complaints.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Elderly woman killed by flying solar panel in Brooklyn as nor'easter hit NYC with strong winds. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Road closed in Hoboken as nor'easter continues. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
items: - Elderly woman killed by flying solar panel in Brooklyn as nor'easter hit NYC with strong winds - NBC News - NBC News (source: NBC News, Mon, 13 Oct 2025 20:50:21 GMT)

Link: https://news.google.?oc=5
- Road Closed In Hoboken As Noreaster Continues - Patch - Patch (source: Patch, Mon, 13 Oct 2025 14:05:55 GMT)

civics_politics.title: Civics & Politics
civics_politics.summary_md:
### Civics & Politics

- Broadway musicians and actors are considering strikes, potentially impacting NYC theater productions. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitgFBVV95cUxONlRjR0RZX2NPTWl1dFZvUzY0cjFib0RKUTc4ZzFKMDV6Z0x5WkQ3d2hla24yRDlaUFMyeldYTnFVakRZZUVnZms5TlpaUHk0NzdDYWhTTVhwckxiSHBxYVM1MFN6NVV1aWJrUVN2dDdZcTM3ZE5JM0xPVXR4YW85Zl9UN3pxTkVOWnhacnhoNkZPWTE3Mnk1aEVjeXgyNE84YXd1YWVHa2dVYTZfZHh3R3A1SGs4UQ?oc=5)
- 70 faith leaders endorse Cuomo in the NYC mayoral race, indicating strong community support. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- City companies are now required to disclose pay data under a newly passed bill. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQNm9mUE5kYXJWMkJzbzVRdF82Mk9sdkR1Q1VTRW9YV0N4SHhZSHB6SDlGVGd5NkE2dm12QkRYYkJKZklSWVkwX25Dd18ycXFzVHE2NEU5aE1oSEdlOVREaE5Ta19EbWUxNl9NZUtpbThHb3h2Wi10Nl96eHhPTlNMWm51dW9lbE9tME9SMDV2Z2V2c2k0MEVfNmluVjl6MkZWMGVSRVZRbXFxQQ?oc=5)
- Debate continues over a street safety measure between the DOT and advocates, affecting local traffic policies. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Quinnipiac poll shows Mamdani leading the NYC mayoral race, despite Cuomo's support on Staten Island. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC tenants have filed numerous complaints about forced broker fees since the ban was enacted. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitgFBVV95cUxOa2ZkOGVJOU85NVV1a3F5djFubXI4ckI2VW14ZHBqbTVKV1dJS2ZESVVkWGhibGJleFBnYjdIeElIMWNuM1dNSVRZbmVTOXlveDl2N2ZPQ1BrQnNJYkVLOXRUeEw0NmJkVXlnMkUwdWpYbFN2d05PRzJpUTItWTVmYmxRanNjalpRUlZWaUtZVU15OHc2X2pkRXJrUl9SN01qelZIQnh4dHdYU2o2b2ZUSjdHSTBSQQ?oc=5)
